extensionDescription.message: Companion extension for Provisions Mod Manager that provides a button on supported websites, like GameBanana, to quickly install mods. Requires Provisions Mod Manager to be installed.

title.message: Provisions Mod Manager: One-Click Installer Settings

sectionWebsite.descriptions: Title of the Supported Websites section in the options page.

sectionOptions.description: Title of various options for website specific functions.

optionModboy.description: Label of the option to remove links to Modboy's one click installer.

optionPort.description: Label of the option for the port to connect to.

optionGrant.message: Missing permission to read and modify websites. Click to grant permission for all websites.
optionGrant.description: Ask the user to grant permmissions to read and modify websites related to TF2 modding.

install.description: Name of Provisions Mod Manager, to be used on install buttons.

installSubtext.description: A short tagline of what the install button does.

installPopup.message: Install '$mod$' in one click with Provisions Mod Manager.
installPopup.description: Explanation of what the install button will do when the user hovers over the button.

installed.description: Text shown when a mod is already installed.

chromePermissionsNotice.message: Chromium-based browsers do not allow revoking permissions programmatically. Use the extension configuration page to revoke access.
chromePermissionsNotice.description: Explanation of why the checkboxes for read and modify permissions for websites is disabled in Chrome/Chromium.

whyPermissionStorage.message: To save settings like which port to use when connecting to Provisions Mod Manager.

whyPermissionNativeMessaging.message: To communicate with Provisions Mod Manager.

whyPermissionDownloads.message: Manage downloads on 'http://mods.tf'. Mods.tf requires you to be logged in via Steam, so downloads must happen in the browser, and not in Provisions Mod Manager.

whyPermissionNotifications.message: Allows us to alert you of any errors; a failed connection with Provisions Mod Manager, for example.

permissionsLearnMore.description: A link to learn more about permissions. Should mirror the text in Firefox's permissions tab.

notificationFailedInstallProvisions.message: Failed to install '$mod$', could not connect to Provisions Mod Manager. Is it running? Is the port correct?
notificationFailedInstallProvisions.description: Reason for a failed installation, due to connection issues with Provisions Mod Manager.

notificationFailedInstallBridge.message: Failed to install '$mod$', could not connect to Bridge. Please re-install Provisions Mod Manager.
notificationFailedInstallBridge.description: Reason for a failed installation, due to an in ability to communicate with the Bridge (Native Host). Ask the user to re-install Provisions Mod Manager.

website_gamebananacom_description.message: A website for sharing and downloading mods.

website_modstf_description.message: A website for downloading cosmetics, customized to work with whichever cosmetic you already own.

website_tf2mapsnet_description.message: A community for sharing and discussing maps, including resources, tutorials, contests.

website_tf2classiccom_description.message: Team Fortress 2 Classic is a free Sourcemod that aims to re-imagine the 2008/2009 era of the original Team Fortress 2. New features range from weapons and maps to gamemodes such as VIP and Four-Team.

website_prefortresscom_description.message: Pre-Fortress 2 is a TF2 sourcemod that caters to the gameplay of earlier Team Fortress installments while maintaining the aesthetics from TF2's alternative designs from 2006.

website_openfortressfun_description.message: Open Fortress is a free, community-developed Team Fortress 2 mod that introduces new gamemodes, characters, weapons, maps and more to the world of TF2. Over 100 community contributors have combined their creativity and innovation with the iconic mid-century aesthetic of TF2 and the gameplay features of classic arena shooters, delivering a truly unique spin on one of the most popular multiplayer games of all time.

website_colorstf_description.message: Enables players to customize the color of Crits sheen on weapons.
